name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace
display_help: You can wield a Medieval Mace and master a variety of powerful Smashing attacks. Attack speeds are good, and the weight of the Mace has good Disorienting capabilities. The sheer weight of this weapon give it a bonus to hit.

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Bash
powers.display_help: You perform a Bashing attack with your mace that deals moderate damage, and can sometimes Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Pulverize
powers.display_help: You attempt to Pulverize your opponent. This attack is slower than Bash but causes more damage. It also has a chance of Disorienting your opponent for a brief time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 20.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
20.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Jawbreaker
powers.display_help: This upward swing attempts to shatter your opponent's jaw, and has a chance to send him flying upwards into the air. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 75.00% chance for 5.2 magnitude knockup on target
75.00% chance for 5.2 magnitude knockup on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Clobber
powers.display_help: You Clobber your foe with a massive swing of your mace. This attack deals exceptional damage and can leave most opponents disoriented for a period of time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Whirling_Mace
powers.display_help: You swing your mace in a circle all around you, attacking everyone in melee range. Your Whirling Mace deals moderate damage, and has a chance to Disorient every foe you hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor Disorient

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 5.96s on target
30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Shatter
powers.display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 8 ft. radius 45° arc (5 targets max)

powers.name: Brute_Melee.War_Mace.Crowd_Control
powers.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage, and knocks them down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 8 ft. radius 180° arc (10 targets max)
